definition: abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])

to scale (a height)/to ascend/to mount/to publish or record/to enter (e.g. in a register)/to press down with the foot/to step or tread on/to put on (shoes or trousers) (dialect)/to be gathered and taken to the threshing ground (old)
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: So bound home from Providence alone, I was groaning to myself on the train.
sentences.chinese: 我独自从普罗维登斯返回，不禁在火车上喟然叹息。

sentences.english: Nassau, on New Providence Island, is the capital and the largest city. Population, 28,000.
sentences.chinese: 拿骚，位于新普罗维登斯岛上，是首都和最大的城市。

sentences.english: Well, the Providence school system is not one of the best ones in the nation.
sentences.chinese: 普罗维登斯的学校体系算不上是美国最好的体系。

sentences.english: He played a trick on the buccaneers by trapping them in their harbor at New Providence.
sentences.chinese: 他在新普罗维登斯港口巧妙的捕获了海盗们。

sentences.english: There is no out-smarting Providence, however, and Leo lived to be 93.
sentences.chinese: 没有外刺痛普罗维登斯，然而，利奥活到93。

sentences.english: In 2005 it was held in Provo.
sentences.chinese: 2005年的年会在普罗维登斯举行。

sentences.english: Chris? Ah, yeah, he lives in South Providence.
sentences.chinese: 克里斯吗？好的。他住在南普罗维登斯。

sentences.english: and he's very, very happy to be in Providence and to get to school and  stuff.
sentences.chinese: 他很高兴来到普罗维登斯，也很喜欢上学。

sentences.english: New Providence is in the Bahamas.
sentences.chinese: 新普罗维登斯在巴哈马。

sentences.english: Nassau, on New Providence Island, is the capital and the largest city.
sentences.chinese: 拿骚，位于新普罗维登斯岛上，是首都和最大的城市。

sentences.english: It is now taught at the College of the Holy Cross, Providence College and Wellesley.
sentences.chinese: 现在任教于普罗维登斯大学和威尔斯利。

pinyin: Bin1 xi1 fa3 ni2 ya4 zhou1
